name: notion_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries in Notion in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling notion_search multiple times. Pass queries as a comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'meeting notes,project plan,Q1 goals')

detailSteps.code: const query = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('_q') || ''; const resp = await fetch('/api/v3/search', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, credentials: 'same-origin', body: JSON.stringify({ query: query, type: 'BlocksInSpace', limit: 5, filters: { isDeletedOnly: false, navigableBlockContentOnly: true } }) }); if (!resp.ok) return { query: query, error: resp.status }; const data = await resp.json(); const results = (data.results || []).map(r => { const block = data.recordMap?.block?.[r.id]?.value; return { title: block?.properties?.title?.flat()?.join('') || '', type: block?.type || '' }; }); return { query: query, result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_result
detailSteps.label: Search Notion
